column333: Review for Fritz Chess 17 Steam Edition (english and french) 1. English With Fritz 17, in addition to the Fritz 17 engine, you get a completely new chess engine that was created with the help of a neural network based on the AlphaZero approach. There are also new exciting functions for creating and practicing opening repertoire. Based on LCZero technology, a neural network was trained with Grand Master games for over a year. The developers named the result Fat Fritz, which, however, needs a very powerful NVidea graphics card to achieve the full game strength. The engine also works on a processor of a commercially available personal computer, delivers very interesting results thanks to the neural network, but is actually up to two thousand times faster on the fast graphics card. Fritz 17 introduces repertoire management that is not based on entire variants but on trains. The Fat Fritz Engine refers to the community project Leela Zero (Lc0). Fat Fritz definitely focuses on analysis. With Fritz 17 and Fat Fritz, Chessbase offers every chess player the opportunity to participate in the new analysis techniques with little effort. Since the Fat Fritz program is based on a self-learning neural network, it is free of all templates. What promises success is preferred, regardless of what the theory thinks of it. On the Computer Chess Ratings List of November 23, 2019, Fat Fritz took first place with the impressive Elo score of 3617 points. High performance is already achieved with an RTX 2080 GPU. An RTX 2080 ti graphics card achieves an NPS performance of 37000. There are three Fat Fritz engine versions available: the one controlled by the main processor ("CPU") and an "Open CL" and a "CUDA" version. The latter two require an extra graphics processor in the computer, and only with one of these is the Fat Fritz engine interesting (a largely undocumented tip is that many AMD graphics cards and even the graphics cores built into modern Intel processors support "Open CL", the performance of the integrated graphics cores is low but still much higher than that of the CPU): Fritz 17 is in any case the first commercial program to contain a modified version of the "Leela Zero" Chess Engine. The GPU is not used to actually calculate. While the search is carried out on the CPU like any other engine, the GPU provides the assessments. But even with the best GPU, the search on the CPU only runs with two cores. Using more cores can even be counterproductive, because what is important is not how fast the CPU calculates, but how quickly the GPU can read the results of the neural networks. The classic engines can use two, four, 32 or 128 cores. And each additional core leads to higher computing power. Fat Fritz and Leela do not use additional CPU cores. The Engine Fat Fritz from the Fritz 17 program is the front runner in the CCRL Elo list and has a positive record against all tested programs. Fat Fritz against Leelenstein 11.1: +16 -11 =164 against Lc0 0.23.1 w42850: +17 -8 =167 against Stockfish 11 64-bit 4CPU: +19 -9 =72 against Allie 0.5 nn49921: +58 -3 =131 against Stoofvlees II a14: +51 -8 =121 2. French Avec Fritz 17, en plus du moteur Fritz 17, vous obtenez un tout nouveau moteur d'échecs qui a été créé à l'aide d'un réseau neuronal basé sur l'approche AlphaZero. Il existe également de nouvelles fonctions passionnantes pour créer et pratiquer le répertoire d'ouverture. Basé sur la technologie LCZero, un réseau de neurones a été formé aux jeux Grand Master pendant plus d'un an. Les développeurs ont nommé le résultat Fat Fritz, qui, cependant, a besoin d'une carte graphique NVidea très puissante pour atteindre toute la puissance du jeu. Le moteur fonctionne également sur un processeur d'un ordinateur personnel disponible dans le commerce, fournit des résultats très intéressants grâce au réseau neuronal, mais est en fait jusqu'à deux mille fois plus rapide sur la carte graphique rapide.  Fritz 17 introduit une gestion de répertoire qui n'est pas basée sur des variantes entières mais sur des trains. Le Fat Fritz Engine fait référence au projet communautaire Leela Zero (Lc0). Fat Fritz se concentre définitivement sur l'analyse. Avec Fritz 17 et Fat Fritz, Chessbase offre à chaque joueur d'échecs la possibilité de participer aux nouvelles techniques d'analyse avec peu d'effort. Le programme Fat Fritz étant basé sur un réseau neuronal auto-apprenant, il est libre de tous les modèles. Ce qui promet le succès est préféré, indépendamment de ce que la théorie en pense. Sur la liste des classements des échecs informatiques du 23 novembre 2019, Fat Fritz a pris la première place avec l'impressionnant score Elo de 3617 points.Des performances élevées sont déjà atteintes avec un unité de traitement graphique RTX 2080. Une carte graphique RTX 2080 ti atteint une performance NPS de 37000. Il existe trois versions de moteur Fat Fritz disponibles: celle contrôlée par le processeur principal ("unité centrale de traitement") et une version "Open CL" et une version "CUDA". Les deux derniers nécessitent un processeur graphique supplémentaire dans l'ordinateur, et le moteur Fat Fritz n'est intéressant qu'avec l'un d'entre eux (un conseil largement non documenté est que de nombreuses cartes graphiques AMD et même les cœurs graphiques intégrés dans les processeurs Intel modernes prennent en charge "Open CL", les performances des cœurs graphiques intégrés sont faibles mais toujours bien supérieures à celles du unité centrale de traitement): Fritz 17 est en tout cas le premier programme commercial qui contient une version modifiée du "Leela Zero" Chess Engine. Le unité de traitement graphique n'est pas utilisé pour calculer réellement. Alors que la recherche est effectuée sur le unité centrale de traitement comme n'importe quel autre moteur, le unité de traitement graphique fournit les évaluations. Mais même avec le meilleur unité de traitement graphique, la recherche sur le unité centrale de traitement ne fonctionne qu'avec deux cœurs. Utiliser plus de cœurs peut même être contre-productif, car ce n'est pas la vitesse à laquelle le processeur calcule, mais la vitesse à laquelle le unité de traitement graphique peut lire les résultats des réseaux de neurones. Les moteurs classiques peuvent utiliser deux, quatre, 32 ou 128 cœurs. Et chaque noyau supplémentaire conduit à une puissance de calcul plus élevée. Fat Fritz et Leela n'utilisent pas de cœurs unité centrale de traitement supplémentaires. Le moteur Fat Fritz du programme Fritz 17 est le leader de la liste CCRL Elo et a un bilan positif contre tous les programmes testés. Fat Fritz contre Leelenstein 11.1: +16 -11 =164 contre Lc0 0.23.1 w42850: +17 -8 =167 contre Stockfish 11 64-bit 4CPU: +19 -9 =72 contre Allie 0.5 nn49921: +58 -3 =131 contre Stoofvlees II a14: +51 -8 =121

column335: We survived. When the sun reappeared above the canyon, the seven hunter's airboats lifted off again, looking for fresh food for the citizens. The energy tower that entered the cooling state was roaring low, and the snow covering the building slowly melted as the temperature rose. The tall robots continue to charge the steam node with energy, and it is their 24-hour continuous operation to ensure the supply of urban resources. Initially, only 80 survivors came from London to this poor city except for a broken tower. In order to obtain more resources and manpower, the child labor bill was passed, and children will work in relatively safe positions. Later, in order to be able to feed more people with limited food, we decided to eat meat with broth. We did not choose to bury the dead. Their bodies are kept in snow pits, and their organs will be used to treat more people who are still saved. For some severely ill people, we chose to amputate their limbs, which saved their lives and gave beds to those in need. We raised a lighthouse in the city and began to look for our lost compatriots. More and more people came to this city, but it also brought bad news: a nearby city, the Winter House has been destroyed. This has caused many people to doubt the reliability of our city. An organization called the London Gang was established. They gathered crowds to make trouble, trying to persuade people to give up what they had built and return to London. In their hearts, London is not. May fall. Our people are facing division. For the benefit of the majority, we choose to protect ourselves by order. The citizens spontaneously take to the streets and set up patrols. With the continuous production of robots and the steady supply of core steam from Tesla City, the city's economy has begun to improve. Dueling arenas and bars were erected in the city, and the supply of standard food was restored to the houses, and people began to regain confidence in the future. The atrocities of the London Gang were also curbed. The perpetrators were thrown into prison, and the guardhouse guarded the streets of the city. People began to slowly leave the London Gang and chose to stay here. Someone suggested that I use whistleblowers or simply establish a new regime like Nazism. I looked at the countless warehouses of food and coal in the east of the city, and told him with a smile that we had not yet reached the point where we had to rely on fanaticism and blind faith to survive. To the point, we now have the capital to live with more dignity. When the severe winter comes, all of my factories are operated by robots, and the citizens basically shelter from the cold at home, and only a few engineers guard their posts in the medical clinic. In the most difficult time, we rely on discipline to keep those mentally broken people sticking to their posts to ensure the integrity of the city's functions. At the end of the game, the developer reviewed the development process of the city, and then asked me, we gave up a lot of things, we crossed the line, the city survived, but is it worth it? This is 1887. I am the mayor of New London. I have 550 citizens living here. We have indeed abandoned some of the fruits of civilization. We have abandoned some beautiful ideals, but it is almost impossible for us to survive. The severe cold of China has the opportunity to rebuild a prosperous human civilization in a warm future. Humans have survived, and I think it's worth it.

column340: Where to start ? By the fact that to have developed such a game alone is a superhuman feat, already. To sum up the principle: you inherit your grandfather's farm, in a small hamlet in a peaceful and isolated region. You will have to start a new life and take care of your home while earning money to improve your daily life. There are so many aspects to this game that it would be difficult to mention them all! In bulk: - Management game first of all, because you will have to manage your finances, your crops, properly configure your fields, know which recipes work (plantation, craft, cooking, etc.). - RPG aspect then, because you will have to select skills to specialize in certain tasks (better quality of your products / greater quantity of products at each harvest, for example). Also because during your walks in the village, you will get to know the different inhabitants, who all have their own house and personality, and worked! You can get to know them, talk to them a bit, and make yourself appreciated by rendering services or offering gifts. You can even go so far as to get married and have children! Or limit yourself to having friends everywhere, if solitude is right for you. Friends will pay you back. - Arcade game, because you will sometimes have to fight during your adventures in the undergrounds, for example. Or also to show dexterity in certain minigames, such as fishing. - Exploration game, because the village is full of small details, hidden places, references and things to discover. And all of these aspects, Stardew Valley treats them wonderfully. Every day that ends in the game, we want to say to ourselves "Come on, one last and then I'll quit", except that it is quickly 5am and we are still working on projects and run everywhere. The music is very good, sometimes dynamic, sometimes cute, sometimes even sad, but it always hits the mark. The graphics are retro, but have a very special charm. The characters are endearing, and the story (yes, there is!) Has some touching moments in store for you. Stardew Valley is a beautiful universe in which to immerse yourself, settle down and dream. Whatever your state of mind, the game will help you escape timelessness. Usually I always cite faults, but here I did not find any notable that deserves to be mentioned. In addition, the developer continues to work on it and add free content. To discover absolutely!

column365: I fell in love with a woman who is nice, brave, beautiful, but also hides a dark past. Lara Croft treasure hunter, explorer's soul, brave heart. These are just a few features that can be boldly attributed to the heroine of the adventures of one of the most associated game-ing series in the world. The next chapter will be marked by the end of the world according to the Mayan culture, exploring the ruins of the state of Peru and admiring the beauty of the virginity of Mexican nature. Lara finds another lead on a legendary item with world-changing powers. Our adventure begins with an atmospheric journey around a Mexican town during the celebration of a significant holiday for a given world culture - the Day of the Dead. The journey culminates in a series of unfortunate events in cataclysms that indicate the end of the world we know. The creators again focused on exploration, for this purpose, a lot of all kinds of items hidden in the game world of the latest Tomb Raider have been added. Was it a good play? Ask this question yourself. At some point, it started to bore me and I started doing the main plot. If you expect a revealing story, full of exciting twists, you may be slightly disappointed. It is a correctly created story, but as it happens in life, sometimes too much correctness leads to boredom and the statement that you would like something else more innovative. However, taking into account the diligence of execution. Tomb Raider is a good game, and the upcoming add-ons (planned for the whole year) can only positively affect the received whole. Best regards, Sebastian "Guma" Guminiczak

column386: Description: Quell is an addictive puzzle game with logic and relaxation. Quell is a representative of the genre of puzzle games (as I often call such games, "logic with space"), which is in no way inferior to, for example, 6180 the moon or micron. I came across it quite by accident, but the more pleasant was my surprise when, in addition to the visual, well-designed style and unobtrusive composition, I was drawn into the gameplay, the essence of which is to collect all the pearls at the level in conditions of limited space, movements and obstacles. Levels: The levels are passed quite easily and naturally, since the game does not have any strict restrictions on time or moves, but there is a so-called perfect (it implies the minimum number of movements to the fastest possible completion of the level). There are three different Quells currently on Steam. With these games, you can safely begin acquaintance with the genre of puzzles in general and then move on to more complex representatives in particular, so I highly recommend watching at least the first part, maybe you will be drawn into an evening or two, like me. Gameplay: Slide a little water droplet around the window pane, avoid thorns and collect pearls. Easy, right? Beauty of the Game: Absolutely, but the beauty of Quell lies in the perfect difficulty curve - it's just cumbersome to test your logic skills, but not so much that it stops being fun. Music: Gentle music (by acclaimed composer Stephen Kravis) and atmosphere create the perfect setting for your brain to be completely immersed in these ingenious puzzles. If you're ready to dig deeper, there is a side story that tells a touching tale of love, loss, and nostalgia. Either way, Quell is a haunting experience that will stay with you long after you finish it. Bottom line: A pleasant and relaxing game with unobtrusive and relatively easy levels of passing. The game is simple, but addictive very quickly. I recommend it, especially with an 80% discount. My rating: 7/10

column399: Так получилось, что серия Assassin's Creed после Black Flag пошла мимо меня. Я перестал следить за перепитиями событий в играх и просто напросто забыл про нее. Ровно до того момента, как мне подарили Истоки. И раз она попала ко мне в руки, то пришлось играть, как бы я в тот момент не относился негативно к ассасинам. И я не пожалел!  Игра рассказывает о том, как вообще все начиналось, откуда взялись эти прыгуны с наручем-кинжалом, и почему и как организовалось это самое братство. Для меня этот сюжет стал неким откровением, хотя и все, что мы делаем в игре - это мстим. Но мстим жестко, кроваво и напролом. Эмоциональные ролики, запоминающиеся персонажи, вопросы морали, воли и силы. Все это катится вперед, подобно снежному комку, который становиться только больше и ведет к финалу. А финал хорош - подводит черту и заставляет испытать сразу несколько чувств, в том числе радость и сожаление - и это все по отношению к нашим героям.  Вообще, игра очень сильно преобразилась, теперь это некая ARPG, пускай и без выбора ответов в диалогах. Очень огромная карта, со всякими ништяками, секретами и квестами. Притом сами квесты, хоть и сводяться к нудному "сходи, убей, принеси, освободи", обладают неким шармом и индивидуальностью. Некоторые раскрывают мир и историю Байека, нашего героя. Какие-то просто рассказывают историю, а некоторые добавлены для того, чтобы отдохнуть и немного посмеяться, расслабившись. Так же понравились загадки с описанием мест и поиска клада в этих местах. А с учетом того, что карта делиться на множество разнообразных локаций - это занятие довольно увлекательно. Правда, и тут не обошлось без косяков - но тут больше вина локализаторов, чем разработчиков. Эти гады не смогли нормально перевести и назначить стороны света. В итоге, в одном из таких приключений я просто потерял несколько часов в поисках клада там, где его и не было. Очень круто сделаны и гробницы фараонов и великих людей - в них просто интересно ходить и исследовать, а так же и некоторые механизмы предтеч, плавно подводящих и рассказывающих нам о событиях 3-й части серии. Так что эта игра подойдет и тем, кто не играл в первые игры серии и решил начать с Истоков. Вообще, говоря о мире не стоит и обходить его красоту. Он действительно красив - здесь есть все. И огромные города, и болотистые джунгли и огромные пустыни. В каждую минуту в мире что-то происходит - правда одно и то же почти всегда. Там на крестьянина напал крокодил, там стража везет преступника в клетке, а вон там не смогли поделить добычу стая гиен и леопард. И выглядит это все очень красиво. Динамическая смена времени суток, волнующееся море, песчаные бури и миражи. Миражи - это отдельная песня. Во время нахождения в пустыне из-за постоянной жары нас время от времени посещают галлюцинации, и иногда это просто пробирает до дрожи. Огорчил тот факт, что у меня они всегда начинались одинаково и шли просто по кругу - я не знаю, должно ли так быть, или просто у меня какой-то косяк. И да, эту игру тоже не обошел стороной факт, что юби не умеют оптимизировать игры. Хотя у себя я все выдавил на ультру и получил 60 фпс, но при запуске игры я всегда страдал микрофризами. А так же время от времени не цеплялся оверлей стима. В остальном игра работала шикарно. А что же насчет геймплея и прокачки? Тут есть несколько интересных моментов. Сама прокачка идет по трем веткам - лук, боевка и упор на инструменты. Выбираешь нужное - вливаешь очки, которые получил за лвл, исследования гробниц, или медитации на местах отшельников. Но нужно быть внимательным - очков мало, а пунктов много. Плюс некоторые умения требуют 2, а то и 3 очка способности. Есть управляемая стрела, есть таран щитом, есть усыпляющий дротик и приручение зверей, а есть привет из Shadow of War - убийство в воздухе из лука. Но с учетом изменения боевой системы - с него не так удобно стрелять. Зато сам бой выходит зрелищным и красивым - если прокачать боевую ветку, то весь Байек с мечом похож на танцующий вихрь. Да и вообще, оружие делиться на различные виды, не только по классам, но и по редкости - каждый со своими способностями, казнями, суперударами. И любой игрок найдет себе оружие по вкусу. Да и вообще, под конец игры я уже не прятался, а был неутомимой машиной смерти - настолько все зашло. В итоге - игра получилась очень большой, обширной, и в ней всегда есть, чем заняться. Вообще, как мне кажется, разработчики решили сделать побольше всего, иногда даже слишком. Некоторые вещи утомляют, но нужно уметь вовремя переключиться на какое-либо другое занятие. Исследуем, делаем квесты, попеременно занимаясь ивентами и сюжеткой - и вот счетчик часов перевалил за 90. А ведь я еще не открыл все знаки, не нашел все побочные квесты и не поучавствовал во всех ивентах. Игра полностью себя оправдала и я с нетерпением жду, что же еще разработчики приготовят в дальнейшем. Вердикт - брать! P.S. Я понимаю, что написано довольно сумбурно, нескладно и так далее. Но прошу понять и простить - я все еще под впечатлением.
column401: Help succubus Lucy find and unravel the mysteries of the Orb of Destiny. • The story, although short, is fun. There are some really cool plots, some ecchi anime clichés, good and fun dialogues (which includes great references to be drawn). • The scenarios and traits of the characters were very well done. And the game gives you the option to take out the HUD to get a better look at the scene. • The stock choice system was well done, because sometimes the game induces you to do something that may seem obvious, but you soon discover that it is not, and you end up dying. So, use your head and make your choices. • The songs are very well matched according to the scenario and the situation. It is even a pleasure to listen. • Has fan service. Visual Novel with succubi and elves, so you can already imagine that you will have it. • Can be played entirely in PT-BR. I have some errors, but nothing that gets in the way of reading. • As soon as I finished the game, I realized, looking at the achievements, that there are some that are conquered in specific choices, that is, the game can have different paths (and I believe that with the same ending). It is a game (Visual Novel) made with great care, fun and worth playing. In addition, at first glance, it can be seen as a standard yuri. And it's true, it can be like that, but you can still see a simple and subtle (and possibly cliché) message in the game. Lucy has something to say to you:

column428: The Sims ™ 3 Advantages: + Another part of the Life Simulator from Maxis + Erpeg aspects - quests have appeared (e.g. someone will ask us to repair the oven, or we will have to replace the guitarist at a concert) and the characteristics that define sims (e.g. one can be Sleepy and another not, one can be an introvert, another kleptomaniac, etc.) + Finally, Sims from other families age with ours (i.e. that there are no such bizarre situations that, for example, we are a teenager, we meet a baby, we grow old until retired , and although our Sim has grown old, the other Sim from another house is still a baby). + Even good graphics and music (although after several dozen minutes of listening to music from the Build Menu, your ears bleed) + You can build ready-made rooms. We choose them from the catalog, set them up and it's ready - we already have a furnished room with wallpaper and flooring. + Furniture and clothes can be dyed in any color (using the color wheel). We also have ready-made patterns such as green palm trees, dark wood, etc. + Simkom's breasts can be enlarged (͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °) Disadvantages -Still takes a long time to load (although it used to be worse, but it still loads longer than most games) - Lots of stuff was cut for ridiculously expensive DLC (most of them cost as much as the game itself, and these adding animals cost € 70 ... T_T) -Microtransactions everywhere (furniture, shoes, hairstyles, even new cities) -Price -Little nonsense from previous parts ( building a friendship is still clicking constantly "Be nice, Be nice, Be nice" Playability: 8/10 Plot: Not applicable Graphics: 8/10 Music: 7/10 Final score: 7.5 / 10 Summary: If you feel sorry to spend money for DLC, don't buy it, because Sims 3 is a complete product if you spend about 400 euros on add-ons. I recommend it, but only with a discount of at least 20 euros (which rarely happens). Otherwise you will not pays off.

column447: PES 2017 has already been announced, and I just now decided to write a review on the 16th part of fotsim from Konami. To begin with, in general I liked the game, but at a stretch you can put the game 7, I think. Why is it so? I will try to answer this question below. I'll start with the pros. Pros: - Atmosphere. The scenes before the start of a football match look very beautiful, I certainly understand that in the same fifa it can be done even better, but PES is also not far behind in this. - Sophisticated players. The players in the game look very realistic, some are designed so well that they are indistinguishable from real footballers, Konami really did their best in this. - The pace of the game. The pace of the game is slower than in FIFA and this is only a plus, as it is more realistic. - Musical arrangement. After the 14th part of the PES, in which the musical background was to say the least bad, the 15th and 16th parts of the game were rehabilitated and gained a good library of music that is pleasant to listen to. You can, I think, still find a few merits of the game, but I indicated the main ones, now I think it's worth moving on to the disadvantages of the game. Cons: - Graphics. The most significant disadvantage for owners of the PC version of the game. I don’t know why Konami is underestimating the graphics for the PC, since the PS4 version looks much better. Perhaps the developers do not want to raise the system requirements by this, since now the system. the requirements are several times less than those of FIFA. - Animation. Konami in the 16th version of the PES added a lot of new animations for football players, thanks to which the realism of what was happening was increased, but along with this some problems came, for example, I had many moments when an attacker ran to the opponent's goal alone and fell from a light touch and instead of running after the ball, he raised his hands signaling that there was a violation, and during this time the opponents were already taking the ball away from their goal. In general, as I said above, I liked the game. For me, this is the best football simulator at the moment, which requires improvements.

Rainbow Six is ​​when, despite all the rewinding mats and hatred of this game, you still enter it with your friends and continue playing and swearing. Rainbow Six is ​​horrible shit with horrible hit registers and lopsided hatboxes and incomprehensible lags and pings, but we keep playing the game anyway. In general, I recommend.

column477: For those who are not in the subject, a top-end remake, I recommend it for purchase. For everyone else who went through the original - spoilers ... And so what we have. And we have a cool rethinking of the second part of the cult horror series Biohazard / Resident Evil. Briefly about the plot - it hasn't changed much, so as not to violate the canon. The difference is in the small details. In 1998 the company "UMBRELLA", and specifically Vasily and Anna Probirkin, cooked all sorts of vile things, viruses, borsch, meth, etc. in the underground laboratory. And suddenly, bam, Vasya banged the G virus, Anka said to him - "what kind of G did you cook?", But let's not be distracted! In short, the information that G is ready has leaked outside the laboratory and, of course, "polite people" have come for him. Such people burst into a "white coat" and say - "bro, give a virus", he is not of this type. They threatened with guns, tried to snatch from Probirkin's hands to snatch a suitcase with test tubes. They say - "Chumodan ways", but he is - "not on the way." They are his bang bang, and he is like - "ah sick", well, in general, the doctor is depressed (. But then this turn happened and our doctor is such a hob, and injects himself with a zanykanny dose of the virus G. Then Anka, his wife runs up. Are you a drug addict? I always knew !!! ", and he writhes like that all over, mutates a dofiga, and figures out to break completely evil commandos. Having overtaken the kids in the dirty sewer, he breaks them, a suitcase, test tubes, common sense, and as it turned out, the fate of the city residents is upstairs RATS. Yes, yes, they are the very ones, these small rodents carried the virus all over the city. And then the fun began. Panic, everyone is eating each other, zombies, gay parades, strikes and other things. Now we turn to our heroes. Leonid Sergeevich Kennedy and Clara Krasnopolskaya meet at a gas station, not far from the city. We chose a good time to arrive in Enotograd, damn it. In short, at the gas station, it's clear zombari, firing. Are they such WTF? And they drove into the city, well, normal in general? Well, according to the plot, they have business in the city , so the story is spinning, achievements turbid. Then a sudden fuel truck separates our heroes, and they each go their own way. As we can see, everything is the same as before. The difference is, as the details say. The changes affected game mechanics and some locations, their sequence, etc. And so everything is recognizable, the police station, the library, the garage, the STAAAAAARS office ... ahem ... ahem ... Sorry, Nemesis has moved in. We run around the police station, shoot off the arms, legs, heads of former homosapiens and other representatives of the fauna. We are looking for all sorts of things in order to go further, everything is the old fashioned way. The remake is awesome, the locations are recognizable at first sight, but have been changed to match the new mechanics. Obsolete parts, such as giant spiders, have been cut, but that's okay, the game hasn't suffered. Mr. X is in place, Ada Vongovna in a red dress is in place. Personally, my opinion - this was supposed to be Resident Evil 6. And not that shooter for the evening (well, or several evenings). There is everything you need, puzzles, scarecrows, a shortage of cartridges (if you are crooked), well, I'm telling you all this is clear for a long time. We are waiting for a remake of the third part. And instead of an assessment, here's a song for you: And now the battle is repeated, And the heart is disturbed in the chest! And Lyonka is so young, And young Nemesis is ahead! And I'll go chase the fourth survivor ...

column486: I think this game is a very carefully crafted game and definitely a masterpiece RPG. The graphics, world view, atmosphere and music are outstandingly good. The battle is a turn-based system, and it is worth mentioning that the enemy AI is smart. If you play on Classic difficulty or higher, it will be wiped out if you are not careful. If you can't win the battle because the difficulty explorer is prepared in the beginner rescue mode, you may want to try it. There is a concept of skill and it will be difficult to win the battle unless you fight by making full use of it. There are also elements such as crafting and blacksmithing, and various items can be created. Items dropped from enemies and treasure chests will randomly drop items with damage bonuses of various attributes (fire, wind, earth, water) and items with additional stats. It is a game with charm that you can play all at once to the end with perfect quantity and quality of quests. Unfortunately, it is difficult to solve some mysteries, and there are some parts that cannot be understood without looking at the capture site. Even considering this point, it is still an excellent RPG, and it is a game that I want many people to play.

column528: Scribblenauts Unlimited is one of the best games I have played. Why? Because you can do anything in this game. All you have to do is type in the name of something in English, e.g. "apple" (translation - apple) and you have a beautiful red apple in the game. You can write the adjectives "big" and "purple" and you have a big purple apple. You can do just about anything, and if something is not there, you can either do it yourself (there is a function in the game, thanks to it we can modify objects) or download steam from the workshop. The plot of this game is very, very unusual. We play as Maxwell, he has a mother (Julie), a father (Edgar), 40 brothers and one sister (Lily). Lily gets a magic globe thanks to which she can travel around the world, and Maxwell gets a magic notebook. If he writes the name of an object in it, that object will appear next to him. For some reason, Lily begins to turn to stone. To disenchant it, we must collect Stars and their shards. (Of course, this is only a short and incomplete description of the plot. If you are interested and curious why Lily turns into stone, and why we have to collect Stars, I recommend you buy it and see for yourself.) +: -Very pretty and pleasing to the eye graphics -interesting heroes (the ability to change Maxwell's features, etc.) -Very pleasant game -Playful with useful, i.e. you can learn English vocabulary (use a dictionary or google translator during the game) -Steam Workshop-Wonderful Music (Edwin's Farm) -In some we have to show off our skills -: -No Polish language -We have to show dexterity in some tasks (I gave it as a plus and minus because some levels in the tasks may be too difficult for children) Summary: The game is great, it stimulates the imagination, teaches English which is why we can count it as an ideal game for children. We only have to teach them first, e.g. to use a google dictionary or translator. But it is also good to play for older people, for example I am an example.

column531: У   есть традиция придумывать хорошие идеи и плохо их реализовывать. Но вот этот проект она не затронула. И, честно говоря, до определенного момента игра мне не нравилась, вот вообще не никак. Я участвовал на всех тестированиях, даже на технических, благо    в этом году расщедрились на приглашения. И игра ни как меня не устраивала, это был скучный шутан уровня "истреби вражескую команду" с кучей однообразных действий. Я даже предрекал игре судьбу Evolve. Так и не понял, что меня сподвигло купить ее, но что произошло, то произошло…  нам повествует историю суровых оперативников и не менее суровых террористов, (которые на самом деле тоже оперативники… почему то… но не суть) ведущих свою войну по определенным правилам и законам. Siege рассказывает о суровой реальности, о реализме и о хардкорности. Тут нет месту наэкранным прицелам, не найдется тут и респауна, но при этом ничто не помешает поднять раненого напарника стимулятором или дружеским похлопыванием по плечу. Раунды состоят из обороны и нападения, каждый раз, одно и то же. Казалось бы, это должно быстро утомить и отправить игрока на экран удаления игры, а то и на кешбек Стима. Но нет, от этого спасает выбор оперативников и вариативность геймплея за них, каждый солдат вооружен разнообразными   девайсами, о которых даже Бонд, Джеймс Бонд не может и мечтать. Перечислять всех не буду, скажу лишь, что на данный момент их 20, при этом каждого еще нужно открыть за специальные балы, которые нам вручают по итогам сражения. На этом все вкусности не заканчиваться, столь любимую кастомизацию оружия тоже завезли, прицелы, рукоятки, обвесы и раскраска на месте, что также подталкивает игрока зарабатывать эти балы. И, понятное дело, микротранзакции в игре есть, кудаж без них то?! Но донат не такой уж и суровый, много очков можно получить, проходя обучение и квалификацию, так что тут все более-менее. Одним большим геймплейным моментом игры является тотальная разрушаемость, ну почти тотальная и почти разрушаемость. Сломать стену или сделать там отверстие для ведения огня? Нет проблем. Пробить потолок и спуститься на этаж по тросу? Раз плюнуть. Запереться в комнате с бомбой, усилить все стены, а на дверь щит под напряжением? Нет проблем. И вроде получилась настоящая крепость, но до того момента, когда с потолка не посыпятся разрывные гранаты FUZE-а.  По ощущениям это все та же старая Радужная шестерка с таки доделанным мультиплеером, причем не только ко-опным, но и ПвП-шным. Но при всем этом это уже не та Радуга, нет тут полноценной компании и даже миссий нет. Есть лишь набор карт, которые используют как в сети, так и в соло режиме. ПвП, как основная часть игры, зачастую очень смахивает на какой-нибудь CS, лишь на 1 из 4 миссий по статистике приходиться выполнение миссии, в остальном же просто уничтожают противоположную команду. Сложно дождаться от рандомной команды слаженных действий по прикрытию вывода заложника, от рандомов вообще сложно ожидать чего хорошего, да в большинстве случаев оно просто не нужно, проще перебить команду врага. Так же, как и в CS тут решает скилл игрока, часто можно наблюдать картину, когда более опытный игрок в начале раунда по защите убегает в укромное место, ждет штурма, заходит в тыл к нападающим и убивает всех.  Но Юбисофт не был бы Юбисофтом, если бы не накосячил где-нибудь. Кривой мачмейкинг, странности в соединении, жуткий сетевой код. При создании новой сетевой игры можно просидеть в поиске последнего игрока до десятка минут, при этом если перезайти, то игра найдется за секунды. Сетевой код сразу же напомнил времена выхода 3 и 4 батлы, когда порой убивали через стены и другие непреодолимые препятствия из-за ошибок. Нормальная ситуация для Siege  – на повторе своего убийства не узнавать свои собственные действия. Уж такой этот сетевой код. В целом игра не плоха, в купе с хорошей картинкой, пониманием основ и собранной командой друзей можно очень даже хорошо поиграть. Однако в отсутствии последних действо может быстро наскучить. Но это уже не столь вина игры, сколько игрока. Ищите друзей, собирайтесь вместе и вперед, ловить преступников, убивать полицейских и строить, строить , строит…   -

column556: Well what to say about Fable Anniversary, already for the connoisseurs of the Saga this installment is a Remaster of The Lost Chapters, an incredible game from the Adventure / Action era. Fable Anniversary gives some improvements to its old delivery improving the setting, modeling, landscape and other objects that leaves it more alive for this time even. In addition to bringing a good arsenal of skills, armor, weapons and a variety of objects to use. Along with its magnificent soundtrack that will accompany us on our adventure. If you have already played the old title, this installment is highly recommended for its improvements in addition to remembering old times, much better if you see it in an offer. If you are new to this and want to play this title for the first time, I will leave you a small summary of its history. - In Fable we put ourselves in the shoes of a child who throughout our journey we will decide to be a Hero or Villain, that will depend on your decisions that you are making throughout the adventure in the world of Albion, as we become our adults Acts of goodness or badness will change our appearance, it should also be noted that throughout our age we will get older, where our face and body hair will be affected. Also in Fable we can modify our appearance, armor, our haircut and beard. Our character will have the duty to save and fight a battle with his fearsome rival Jack of Blades to save his family and the land of Albion. Some negative points of the title are its targeting system and controls, but if you usually play with a controller this is easily solved since the game is made to play more comfortable this way and last but not least its scarce content in Mods, They promised a lot but the tools were very limited. With nothing more to say, thanks for reading my little analysis. A big greeting from Chile

column560: Remakes are often poorly implemented and keep annoying me. I gambled all parts of Resi (except RE3), and unfortunately I have to say that everything got worse and worse after Resi 4. Therefore skepticism towards this remake. But luckily unfounded! Graphics, atmosphere, soundtrack are terrific! When was the last time I was so scared? The trip through the police station is great fun, and lots of details complete the picture perfectly. When the Tyrant (MrX) appears for the first time, however, the leisurely exploring is over;) In my opinion, Capcom has done everything right here and that's exactly what Resi fans want. - Fear - a small selection (but not at the beginning) of weapons - little ammunition - little medicinal herbs -The zombies (lovingly called customers by me) are now opening the door and are also sometimes on the move, I think that's great. - There is also a Mr. X Tyrant here who is always on the heels, sometimes he is so persistent that you can solve the puzzle before Mr. X gives you an ankle swing. The only negative point would be the German syncro but you can just play it in English, so that's half the game. Thank you very much Capcom 10/10

column571: Очередной порт от Sega для ПК. Катерина или Кэтрин, очень притягательная и интересная головоломка, сочетающая в себе режим повествования где мы просто общаемся с людьми, друзьями, и размышляем вместе с героем об его ситуации в жизни, а также сам главный геймплей, перетаскивание кубов с целью выстроить себе путь к вершине.  Сама часть с головоломками в основной кампании не заставит вас страдать, только если вы конечно не хотите проходить всё на золото. Сложность очень даже щадящая при игре на среднем уровне сложности, на сложном будут трудности, но даже они будут встречаться уже в конце где вы скорее всего уже привыкните к механикам и техникам этого геймплея. Помимо обычной компании вас ждут, 128 уровней Рапунцель (местного игрового автомата) механика в котором никак не меняется, меняется лишь несколько условностей, нельзя увлекаться с падением уровня, и вас также ограничивают по количеству действий с блоками. Режим крайне нудный, особенно если вы хотите проходить его залпом. Следующий режим это Babel, набор из 4х уровней к каждому из которых необходим свой подход, набор этих испытаний самое трудное что мы можете встретить в игре. К моему сожалению, по логике Atlus, 2ем этот режим проходится легче, вам необходима меньшая высота, в то время как в одиночном прохождении этого режима вам понадобится гораздо больше ступеней до победы (на 20-50 больше).  Что же до основного сюжета этой игры, он забавен, хоть и бесит в некоторых местах, но оправдание таким моментам что без них попросту бы не было самой игры. Главный герой Винсент Брукс, 32 летний мужчина который ведёт раздолбайский образ жизни, имеет довольно унылый образ жизни (работа, бар, дом), не очень уверен в будущем и каждый раз сомневается в своих действиях. В один момент его жизни, к нему в баре подсаживается буквально женщина его мечты, которая также не понимает человеческие рамки, хочет жить свободной и не о чём не думать. Тут то главный герой и попадает в её сети, всё было бы ничего если бы у Винсента уже не было девушки с которой он встречается довольно продолжительное время, и которая уже грезит об свадьбе. Примерно с таким синопсисом и начинается основное повествовании данной игры. Ну и самое главное, на какую сторону в итоге склонится Винсент зависит именно от вас и ваших решений: на разгульную, независимую и беззаботную, или же на порядочную, связанную узами брака и ответственностью.  Кому же в итоге я могу посоветовать данную игру. На самом деле мало кому, если вы хотите головоломку на время, то Кэтрин для вас. Если вы наслышаны об Atlus, но пока не щупали их творения, то наслышаны об игре, и скорее всего уже в неё играете. Любителям остросюжетного сценария и сюжета тут делать особо нечего, сюжет очень прост, хоть и имеет некие тонкости, но это только касаемо самого лора этого мира. Вот и получаем довольно узкий круг аудитории для данной игры. Сам же слежу за играми Atlus и жду новых портов от SEGA игр данной студии. P.S. Если всё же решите приобщится к игре, то загляните в сообщество игры, а именно в тему с бета-патчем, таким образом вы сможете разблокировать для себя 60-240 фпс в игре. Но лично я крайне не советую, игра вот прям сделана для того чтобы играть в неё на 30, но опять же, это лично моё наблюдение Now's Not The Time To Be Dead!

column607: I've been a fan of the BattleTech universe for a long time, and this is the first quality strategy game in the last few years. This game has the entire spectrum of the simulator of a commander of a mercenary lance: both battles and the entire spectrum of economic components, such as staff salaries, repair and modification of mechs, transport ... For me, this is the first strategy in which you can lose a battle, lose several units of equipment , but under no circumstances should the payment of bills be deferred. The only drawback is the limitation on landing in one lance, i.e. 4 furs. The plot is rather prosaic: you, a former officer of the Imperial Guard, are helping to restore the deposed empress to rights, at the same time earning money on leftist missions

column626: Hidden Through Time presents a dynamic point-and-click of hidden objects, that is, the main objective of the title is to find pieces hidden by certain parts of the maps, which can be animals, people or objects. The game has several levels that were based on the periodization of history, which starts in prehistory with men of the stone age, in the age of metals with Egyptian civilization, in the Middle Ages and later in the West in the United States ( XIX century). The scenarios are formed by simple backgrounds of solid colors, together with the characteristics that represent their respective time. In each level a list of hidden objects is given with some mysterious hints to facilitate the searches. In addition, the learning curve is quite satisfactory, according to the progression of the more difficult levels they get. The online mode is the first highlight of this game, because through it you can experience the stages created by other players and leave feedback. The second highlight, on the other hand, goes to the editor mode, which makes it possible to create several levels with a huge variety of items to later publish them. The 2D graphics of the title are well-made, cute, colorful and have a more cartoon-oriented style. Unfortunately in the game there is only one instrumental song, which makes it very repetitive after a certain time, since the sound effects are activated when interacting with something on the map, this allows the game to become more intuitive and dynamic. However, this HOG (hidden objects games) can be recommended for any audience, but mainly for children, because it is a type of game that contributes a lot in the formation of the child's cognitive. Other than that, the game can serve as a great pass of time, being able to yield on average between 3 to 5 hours of gameplay to complete all levels, in addition to the map creation mode. It is worth remembering that the title requires good concentration and great vision, for players who have vision problems, Hidden Through can be very tiring. • Well-optimized graphics; • In total 19 achievements; • Provides 14 languages, including PT / BR • Offers level editor; • Save in the cloud and compatible with the control. • Add more songs to the repertoire; • In the Western Town map created by the community, it contains a • Correct the sound of the frog that sounds like a bird; • Add sounds for animals that do not own, such as the bear, American bison, vulture, ox, cow and raccoon. Curatorial analysis | |
column628: Fruit of Xbox Live Arcade Castle Crashers arrived shy on PCs winning a remastered version exclusively for Steam, with its diverse arrival players acquired it due to its very affordable price and these players were presented with one of the best beat 'n up ever made, fun playing alone or with friends, Castle Crashers undoubtedly brought people together and entertained a lot of people for a long time. A beat ‘n up game as in the classics of old consoles, your character must advance the levels by hitting enemies and collecting items. The simple storyline tells the story of a kingdom that had its princesses and a powerful kidnapped crystal, you choose one of the four playable characters (during the game other characters will be unlocked), where each character has different abilities and powers, in addition to the faithful squires pets of players who also have different skills. Castle Crashers has an unusual narrative format for today. It is not possible to find a single line of dialogue throughout the game. Not even texts that give details of what is happening or explain the premise of the game are present. In this type of format, the player must interpret the plot as he sees fit. The difference is that, in Castle Crashers, the story is quite evident, mainly thanks to the way all characters, including NPCs, behave on the screen. This is all the result of impeccable art direction. The backgrounds are extremely captivating and the expressions made by the characters while they are being beaten are sensational and very humorous. Combined with nonstop action and a lot of agility, the title becomes absurdly fun, especially when playing locally with others. It is not difficult to spend an entire stage laughing while chopping up the most varied types of opponents through scenarios that are full of diversities. This is something that was very well thought out. The game unfolds through a map that represents the game world, where there are several different stages that the player can access as many times as he wants and whenever he wants. There are also aspects of RPG (very basic, but essential), being quite rewarding and at the same time accessible. As you pass the level, you'll gain new combinations of blows to use against different types of opponents. And, unlike many titles, the old blows do not become obsolete, since the ideal is to have a harmony and intelligence to know when to use a movement against an enemy. The spells, in turn, are quite varied and can serve as a way to take enemies out of combat or cause greater damage. All attacks are upgraded according to points of dexterity spent on attributes of the player's choice: strength, which improves damage; magic, which improves magic attacks and their regeneration; defense, which improves defensive capabilities and the amount of hit points; and agility, which improves speed and long-range attacks. To increase the life of the game, Behemoth has created an Insane mode, which is unlocked after the game is finished for the first time. In this mode, the adventure is much more difficult than usual, something interesting for lovers of challenges. Castle Crashers also has two extra modes, the Arena where the character must face hordes of enemies and All You Can Quaff, a mini-game in which the goal is to eat faster than opponents, a type of modern button crunch, it is worth remembering which are not adjacent to campaign mode and are hobbies. In addition, Castle Crashers brings an excellent online mode, games without falls and very functional, in addition to being multiplayer between platforms, that is, PC players can play together with players from Xbox 360 and PS3. Castle Crashers doesn’t have any glaring defects, some more caveats deserve to be commented on, the online mode doesn’t have a well-defined criterion, several times I’ve started games with my character at level 1 and the other players at levels 40, 50 or more, this is complicated, because these higher level players dominate the games and it ends up getting boring, because you become a supporting player in gambling, another little problem is that in some stages there are so many elements on the screen that it is quite confusing to situate yourself and ends up generating some deaths of the characters that could be avoided. Finally, the game's strong point is the quality of all the elements itself, with the small exception of the problems mentioned a few lines earlier, each part was thoroughly produced, resulting in a satisfying, fun and excellent final product. EDIT: When mentioning the other game modes I put the All You Can Quaff mode, but that mode was replaced by the Back Off Barbarian mode, which consists of moving around the scene to the sound of a good soundtrack, without letting the enemy reach.

column681: Everywhere in the world there is noise, din, vanity, But here there is only snow, emptiness; On the vast expanses there is only a blizzard, Desolation and silence ... It slowly drives you crazy; It's getting harder and harder to keep your sanity; Howl comes from afar, It wakes up animal instincts ... How many days have passed since then, How did you end up here, among the snow and mountains? Days, nights, months, years or centuries ... What, you don't remember, huh? Crazy Yeti ... Say it wrong? Well, take a look at yourself ... Well, bolder, don't be afraid ... Shrouded in furs ... Like a beast, no, not like that; outwardly you are a man, But your gaze has changed, changed, faded ... You are no longer a pilot that you were before, believe me, You are an animal, a wild, merciless beast, That you are ready to kill, not counting losses. Death is close, be careful, calm down your ardor ... Survival is a difficult, very painstaking process, But only where is the line, are you a beast or a man? Survival, life ... Everything is the same in this century, We are all driven through life only by fear or stress ... (c) LoNeSwAnTaN 01/12/2018 1:30 p.m.
column684: Не так давно я была полностью восхищена проектом   и концепцией уменьшения главного героя, где привычные нам предметы становятся просто гигантскими и нам приходится искать к ним новый подход. Теперь ту же идею, но совершенно в другом исполнении представляет нам Метаморфозис! В невероятном приключении с глубоким сюжетом, платформере с головоломками.   Мы - Грегор Замза, просыпаемся не в своей постели и, определив что мы находимся в доме нашего лучшего друга Йозефа K, после славной вечеринки в честь его дня рождения. Пытаемся отправиться на работу, но тут внезапно - начинаем превращаться в насекомое. Найденное нами письмо открывает нам, что снова стать человеком мы сможем только в Башне. Вскоре, мы узнаем что нашего друга арестовывают, причем совершенно удивительным и разумеется самым абсурдным способом.   Мы же, в роли жука, ничем не можем помочь, поэтому все наши силы тратим на путь к Башне, по дороге встречая действительно интересных персонажей.   В конце пути нам придется сделать выбор, что приведет нас к одной из двух концовок.   На самом деле, в этом всем есть некая ирония над "свободой выбора", потому что так-то его и нет. Играя, мы очень хорошо прочувствуем себя жуком, так как мы не просто меньше, мы имеем другое положение и почти касаемся земли, прыгаем и бегаем иначе. Можем летать на бумаге подхваченной ветром и подниматься по отвесным книгам с помощью липкого меда или чернил. Когда мы передвигаемся по миру, учитывается не только наклонность поверхности, по которой мы можем забраться, но и её текстура. Так, например, по тканевой спинке кресел мы можем перемещаться абсолютно под любым углом, даже без липких лапок, а вот на стекло, даже будучи с приобретенной способностью ходить по стенам, нам забраться не удастся. Также Грегору сложно ходить вниз головой, по потолку, он падает спустя всего пару секунд, как только мы загоняем его туда. Решая различные головоломки мы можем крутить механизмы, нажимать на кнопки, а так же взаимодействовать с предметами с помощью нашего веса. Подобные загадки никогда не вызывали особых затруднений у большинства игроков, а вот потеряться меж книг довольно просто. Благо карта, которая назначена на [Tab], довольно быстро проинформирует нас о проделанном пути и интересных точках для посещения. Их также можно отключить в настройках игры, тем самым повысив себе сложность.   Вы когда-нибудь спрашивали себя "Сплю ли я" в течении своего обычного дня?    Спала ли Алиса, когда падала в кроличью нору? Спит ли Грегор, решая судьбу своего друга?   Если бы это была обычная игра, подчиняющаяся всем мирским правилам и логике - очевидный ответ: "Да!" Наверняка все это приснилось Грегору в пьяном бреду!   Но в мире Франца Кафки вы можете умереть будучи насекомым, под весом яблока, что упадет на вас с неба. Об этом нужно помнить.   Никто так и не расскажет нам "почему мы превратились в насекомое". Все это автор дает на откуп нашей фантазии. И лишь мы, с нашими уникальными ассоциациями полученными в ходе нашей жизни, найдем свой ответ.   И лично меня не покидала атмосфера сказки, злой сказки: Алисы страны чудес в стиле Оруэла, Волшебника Оз с образами Кафки и немного Дали. А внутренний уровень архива казался мне отделом министерства магии из-за парящих, в стройном потоке, бумаг.  Что интересно, именно в этой комнате вы не можете умереть, так как при каждой вашей "смерти" вас подхватывает визитка и, будто бы абсолютно случайно, очень бережно доставляет вас на место последнего сохранения.   Интересно прописаны и диалоги с НПС, с которыми у нас связаны квесты. Кроме того, что главный герой задает весьма логичные дополнительные вопросы, например: "А почему ты сам не можешь этого сделать?" Они отвечают довольно правдоподобно о причинах, по которым им очень нужна помощь или дают веский контраргумент, более того в речи часто встречаются слова: "если ты не занят, если можно, был бы ты любезен", что я, как человек выросший в rpg на "Эй, ты! Принеси 10 шкур!", считаю удивительным и прекрасным. Но если на чистоту, то это приносит определенной живости и проработанности миру.   Отдельное место в этой игре, конечно, занимают саундтреки. Меня то и дело кидало в дрожь, когда летишь над пропастью и тут завывает дама, потом то тихо шепча, то обрушивая всю мощь своего оперного голоса, развивает свою историю, будто это баллада о чьих-то похождениях. Захватывающе.   И атмосфера злой сказки или вот вот свершившегося правосудия - постоянно присутствует рядом.   Иногда смущают некоторые не физические предметы, например, пленка в кинопроекторе, та что меж катушек, а еще некоторые каменные плиты в конце игры, провод сквозь который можно пройти. А если будете прыгать в поиске пути там, где его нет - познаете прекрасный мир затекстурья.

column688: An appealing puzzle game that invites you to think and puzzle. Genre: Puzzle, Hidden Object and Room Escape Game / Casual Game Pro: + different puzzles (variety); good mix of simple and somewhat "more demanding" puzzles + graphically nicely designed; loving design + trading cards and achievements available + background music and sounds very appropriate (sound can also be muted) + reasonable price-performance ratio (also worth buying outside of a sale) Cons: -from and occurring image flickering when clicking (does not necessarily have to be play) -too short playing time; a puzzle room is a little too little - "story" is too flat; more depth would be desirable. Conclusion: Nice game for in between for those who like to puzzle, puzzle and just want to try something new. For 1.99 € you get a small, carefully designed game that can score points just because of its design and the individual puzzles. For this reason, I would like to make a PURCHASE RECOMMENDATION at this point. Tip: There is another Greenlight project in progress that is certainly worth seeing.

column691: When we talk about 'FPS' we are directly talking about 'CSGO'. for me the best fps game there is, it has its negative points like the toxic community, hackers, and etc ... but it is really impossible not to put the cs among one of the games that revolutionized the gamer community in the world! Positives: Easy to play casually / professionally Extremely light, you will be able to play csgo even with an i3 without an off board, with the graphics in the low. Negative points: Extremely toxic community, that is, 1 in 3 matches that you enter competitive mode, most likely you will have a 5/10 child cursing the whole team. Long waiting periods in the creation of competitive matches, it can take 5 seconds or 5 minutes to find a match. The menu crashes: the cs menu has a spell because every time you try to change some graphics the game simply stops working for about 10 seconds, so here's the tip, never change graphics in competitive matches. Imbalance: I may be crazy, but there is a lot of imbalance within the game, even though I am in the same rank, because I realize that some people play a lot, and others play little, this being for example in gold 1, the famous smurfs. valve should create a system where it detects smurfs and puts them in their true link ...
column692: After having completed the game 3 times and obtained all the achievements I feel that I am worthy of giving a review. Pros. * Blasphemous has a certain linearity but it does not force you to follow a specific path, according to this we can divide the game into 2 parts: the Town of Albero and surroundings up to Esdras, the High Cathedral and surroundings up to Escribar. Of course, you can't skip any boss. * With enough practice you can beat each of the bosses without needing to become a machine, anyway once you get the 5th upgrade for Mea Culpa the game becomes a breeze. * The game rewards calm and analysis of the combats, there are many scenarios in which if you are confident and moving too fast, the game will punish you with a bad jump or a blow that will lead you or to fall into the void or to the thorns. The same happens with combat in general, you must learn how your enemies move to be able to execute or dodge them in an optimal way. * The voice actors are a gem, except perhaps Crisanta who is not bad but does not compare to the rest, for example, when fighting with Escribar and her presentation gives you that feeling that you are fighting a magnanimous being, Crisanta is not . Cons * The fucking thorns, they are far the final boss of the game, it happens a lot with platform games in any case but those of this game were particularly hateful. * The duration of the game is not sooo long, we are not talking about a Castlevania and we must also consider that this started from a kickstarter, but a little more duration would have been appreciated. With 15 hours you already have the game mastered. * As every opinion is subjective and depends on the person, in my case I was not a fan of the music, I am not saying that it is bad, it complies with the immersion of the player to the environment, but on my side it made me a bit uncomfortable in certain sections ( ex. Exposito) In summary, Blasphemous is a good game, and the creators deserve all the support to continue creating similar content and I hope for a longer duration. I had a good time, I suffered a couple of days from quarantine and now I'm waiting for the DLC or sequel. Stay home and take care of a lot of people.

column754: Assassin's Creed: Origins is another part of a series of historical action games from Ubisoft, which takes place in Ancient Egypt. The game tells the story of the beginning of the war of the Knights Templar and Assassins, thus being the prequel to the entire series. The protagonist of the game is a mejai named Bayek, who witnesses a number of historical events and is involved in confrontations with people who later organize the Order of the Templars. The gameplay of AC: Origins is seriously different from previous parts of the series. Part of the combat system is more like Skyrim or Dark Souls than previous Assassin's Creed. It is also worth noting that the game has many role-playing elements, such as a large selection of different weapons, a branched skill tree and more. The world in Origins is the largest in the games series, and offers players a look at Ancient Egypt from the time of Cleopatra and Caesar. Occupy the sea here: and branded towers, and checkpoints, and battles in gladiatorial arenas, and hunting, and chariot races, as well as the study of tombs. Very atmospheric and exciting game. Especially suitable for fans of ancient Egypt and that era. Gameplay, graphics, characters, all at a high level. "Sources" - a great game. One of the best in the series. She drags on for long hours, knows how to take the soul of the plot.

column758: Borderlands is the first part in the BL franchise, and if those who got acquainted with the series only in the second part (like me) enter it, then you probably won't believe that this is the first part of Borderlands. The HUD is not familiar, the world is dull and made in the same colors (except for the last locations, they are beautiful there), the enemies are the same type, and the tasks are terribly primitive. The plot of the game does not shine, so go through strictly with someone in a cooperative so as not to die of boredom faster than you reach the final boss, which, if you wish, can be reached in a whole day. Bosses are not memorized from the word at all. Side quests are dull and boring ......... until you get to the DLC, which is an order of magnitude better than the game itself. The introduction of new characters, a wonderful plot in them, interesting side quests - you will find all this there. Hell, even the arena will be better than the whole game. Bottom line - if you are going to go through it, then purely for familiarization, and then for fans. For those new to the Borderlands world, the game may seem boring. The first part is more like a test of mixing RPG with shooters and the formula turned out to be good, but not perfect.

column767: The portal is open ... You find yourself in a living, intelligent, biotech house in a deeply depressed state. The house is in ruin, various devices do not work, the druid-mistress of the house has disappeared somewhere and the carpet is torn in the living room! Well, you have to help ... An incredible adventure awaits you in an amazing, surreal world with colorful, memorable characters. Pay no attention to the simple, childish and lurid graphics, although I liked it. Everything is so bright and colorful. The most important thing here is the plot and serious adult topics about politics and philosophy. There is a lot of text here, it's like a good thick book that sets you up for a leisurely, thoughtful reading. Dialogues with characters who have their own opinion on any issue are very interesting and intricate. It's nice to go into some tavern and chat with visitors about some found item, event, place, or other character. The world is small, but all locations are very detailed and interesting to explore. Almost all objects in the game are clickable and have a description, each book, bottle, box, flower is unique. What can I say. Here, every nail driven into the wall is an object of a universal scale! And the mushrooms (oh, mushrooms !!!!), of which there are probably several hundred in the game, are generally some kind of socialist-anarchists! The game has a lot of humor, clever jokes, puns, which, unfortunately, I did not understand everything. For such a leisurely game there is very pleasant and calm music here. The game has a classic interface of old adventure games. Move between screens using arrows, a map, a list of quests, a funny backpack with inventory, items in which you can touch, smell, taste, and even give the backpack mouse. Puzzles are interesting, they are not complicated, understandable. Quests are all logically understandable, they are easy to go through, you do not have to rush in all directions to find some object or do something. It is enough just to talk to the surrounding inhabitants. There are several mini-games. The only problems I have with hidden achievements, but you can learn about them with a good knowledge of English. I really liked the game. Behind all this surrealism of current events, politics, chatter and jokes, there are ideas of humanism and just love of life. At the end of the game, I drank a bottle to the developer's health and said goodbye to every character in the game. It was an incredible adventure that I will remember. The portal is closed ...

column773: Construction-Simulator 2015 is a simulator made by Astragon, which is already known for its bad simulators, but what cannot be said about this one. Pros: - Graphics are ok and contemporary - Good sound - Good gameplay - Detailed vehicles - 15 true-to-the-original vehicles from MAN, Liebherr and STILL - Over 250 tasks on over 150 different construction sites - Workshop - Achievements - Controller and gamepad support - Large, freely accessible Game world - Multiplayer Cons: - A lot of bugs, which can reduce the fun in some places - Performance All in all it is a successful construction simulator, albeit with a few bugs. The price is reasonable in my opinion and the game offers a lot of content for a fairly low price. Definitely recommended for people who like building, otherwise it is not for everyone. I give the game 8/10 points. column784: Crysis is a shooter that combines stealth and strategy during the first half of the story and then ends with a sci-fi addition that totally changes the game style. The protagonist possesses a high-tech nano-suit that allows him to increase his abilities in real time on the battlefield. He can choose to improve speed, strength, armor, and cloaking skills to deal with situations in creative tactical ways. He also has an arsenal of weapons that can be modified according to your play style. But no matter how strong the character is, you can't go crazy, since the AI ​​is well programmed and enemies can easily kill you if you are careless. The story is a bit cliché but it works very well. What I did not like was that the game installs an anticheat that is useless, since the multiplayer mode has been dead since 2014. The question is whether it is still productive to play a game that came out in 2007, and the answer is YES; the game complies with providing you good moments of action. I have high expectations for the Crysis Warhead.

column792: Payday 2, a very good game. A team game for up to 4 where you will rob banks, get Hoxton out of jail, and many other things. You have skills, 5 trees in total that you can increase with skill points by leveling up, many guides are available on the net to build a build even without too much knowledge. You also have a ton of weapon, grenades, a melee, even a mask that you can customize. Only here, it is true that Payday has a ton of dlc, but only 2-3 are necessary to really advance in the game. So for dlc here is what I think: - 6 € for some, it is can be a little abused it's true, - For the successes, a lot can be obtained by playing on the map that a friend will not need to buy the dlc, - In promotion the price drops enormously (-75%) in general, - A lot of dlc are not required for a good gaming experience, - Finally there are a lot of giveaways on the net. So much for the dlc, but why so much hatred in the other evaluations? Because of the microtransactions which seem to bother a lot of people, while they are still minor in the game. So you can buy skins for your weapons, good .. But some skins will give you bonuses, +4 stability , wow .. And that's what people get upset about .. Namely, the community has been so toxic and dumb with Overkill that they really felt bad and apologized. Then skins are offered for free with success, after possibility of dropping safes or even drills (so yes, possibility of drop 2 €) and finally, recently, a Shift has added boosts that have little to drop and put on our weapons, like +4 stability for example! The game has a long lifespan with all the achivements and the maximum level, infamy 25-100 or for those who do not understand, level 2600. Finally Overkill makes a lot of efforts, also for modding and interacts with the community. So yes, Overkill does need some "income" to keep improving the game and yes I finished the game myself, but will continue to play it with friends for more fun! (My update is a bit dated and the game has changed a lot since then, there will be an update for my review, but not immediately.)

Wild prices for fake whistles. Commensurate with the cost of the game itself. True, the only one that offers anything other than the look of DLS is Starstorm. Adds several new units, at least one of which is clearly knocked out in balance, which is really annoying. If you are on different teams). Pros: Cons: Let's summarize. The game is not bad, even interesting, but for the time being. And the time comes pretty quickly. Of course, all of the above is purely my personal opinion and someone does not agree with this (scolopendra-destroyer, I know what you are reading!). In any case, the game is worth its money (although against the background of donation, you can call the purchase of the game "first installment") and you will definitely spend at least a couple of fun evenings with it.

column817: Жёлтый заряженный ламбо, 300 лошадей под капотом. Об этом звере мечтают многие жители солнечного Скайрима, но эта красавица есть только у крутого красавчика, орка по имени Майкл, но вы глупы если думаете, что эта тачка досталась Майклу за честный и покорный труд. Майкл скумовый мул. Он уже 10 лет промышляет этой работой и висит на волосок от смерти, но всему когда-то приходит конец, Майкл решил завязать. Последнее дело, 150 тысяч септимов за партию скумы и Майкл выходит из этого опасного бизнеса. Но как в жизни водится, последнее дело может оказаться и последним в жизни. Вроде бы ничего не предвещало беды, обычный для Майкла маршрут оказался опаснее чем обычно, ведь в Скайриме объявился опасный как бритва тёмный эльф по кличке "RED BULL"и он намерен забрать партию скумы, и отправить на дно озера Толука нашего мачо Майкла. Всё происходило стремительно, Майкл выдавал неспешные виражи по каньону "Карбон", как ему резко ударило в зад что-то стремительное и страшное, это нёсся красный феррари тестаросса за рулём которого находился RED BULL. Майкл уже в бизнесе не первый год и сразу понял что к чему. Рука на автомате потянулась за узи в бордачке, Майк не собирался выходить из этой гонки проигравшим. Скорость уже доходила до 300 км/час. В красную феррари летели очереди из узи, это было похоже на безумный танец ДЖИГАЛАХА. RED BULL так же как и Майкл был не из робких малых. Его бронированный феррари сносил оплеухи от узи на ура, а для отпора неприятеля у него был заготовлен арбалет, нужно было только хорошенько прицелится. И вот напряжение нарастает, каньон закончился и две супер мощных тачки выходят на финишную прямую. Один выстрел с арбалета по шине и жёлтый ламбо Майкла переворачивается в воздухе. Тачка разбита, груз уже никак не забрать, а за ним движется страшный тёмный эльф. "Нужно спасти свою шкуру" промолвил Майкл. И как заправский грязекраб слился с лесом, впереди виднелась заправка, это единственный шанс на выживание. Феррари RED BULLа остановилась. "Нужно перекинуть партию скумы к себе в багажник, а потом грохнуть этого сраного орка" сказал себе RED BULL. У RED BULLа был принцип, никогда не оставлять тех, кто в будущем может тебе отомстить. Да и предугадать действия орка было очень легко, буквально в двух метрах виднелась заправочная станция. Перекинув груз в свою феррари RED BULL упёр педаль газа в пол и двинулся к заправке. В это время Майкл уже до неё добрался, но тут была подстава, на заправке стоял только один огромный автобус. "На этом говне никак не смыться от этого мудня" подумал Майкл. Ничего не оставалось кроме как дать бой этому страшному тёмному эльфу. У узи оставалось одна обойма, Майкл был решителен как никогда. Феррари RED BULLа приближалась к заправке. Майкл спрятался за автобус и краем глаза следил за следующими действиями его врага. RED BULL подъехал к заправке и вылез из машины как ассасин из тёмного братства. На его лице не было ни капли страха. Тактично осмотрев территорию, тёмный эльф понял где его цель. Он быстро переместился на противоположную сторону автобуса. "ЭЙ СРАНЫЙ ОРК, ТЫ ЖЕ ПОНИМАЕШЬ, ЧТО ВСЁ КОНЧЕНО, НЕ РВИ СРАКУ, СЛОЖИ ОРУЖИЕ И СДОХНИ БЫСТРО". Майк был взбешён подобной наглостью. "Я ТРАХАЛ ТВОЮ МАМУ СРАНЫЙ УРОД" выпалил Майкл. Действовать надо было быстро, лёгким движением он запрыгнул на крышу автобуса, и с дикими воплями побежал на тёмного эльфа поливая его свинцом из узи. RED BULL укрывался и перекатывался, паля арбалетными стрелами в оппонента, но неудачное местоположение сыграло с ним злую шутку. 3 пули пробили эльфу печень, а из его его уст вылетел жалобный плач "АЙ МЛЯ". Бой был закончен, арбалет выпал из руки RED BULLа, и он больше не мог ничего сделать. Майкл приближался к поверженному оппоненту с улыбкой победителя. Подойдя к RED BULLу, Майкл произнёс "Потрепал ты мне нервишки мудень, но пришло время расплатиться за трату моего времени". Прицелившись в голову Майкл спустил курок, но произошло, то чего никто не ожидал, у Майкла закончились патроны. Поняв что произошло  Майкл и RED BULL громко рассмеялись. "Сегодня твой счастливый день, тебе был преподан ценный урок" произнёс Майкл. Ещё несколько секунд стояла гробовая тишина. Майкл выбросил узи, забрал ключи от тачки RED BULLа и двинулся к феррари. Приближался восход, у Майкла оставалось время завершить заказ и закончить свою карьеру скумокурьера. Мощный двигатель взревел и орк унёсся в закат. А тёмный эльф смотрел на уносящийся в даль автомобиль и ухмылялся. Скоро он совершит свою месть, и произойдёт это очень скоро.
